name: We're Scewed
description:
Game

You control a group of stranded robots, gathering scraps to restore a rescue beacon.

Only problem is, you have limited battery power - Sacrifice any weak robots that may bring everyone else down.

Controls

The game is played entirely with a mouse.

Credits
